```{r}
library(hurricaneexposure)
library(hurricaneexposuredata)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tigris)
library(USAboundaries)
library(acs)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r}
us <- states()
plot(us)
```


```{r}
us_states <- states()
us_states_20m <- states(cb = TRUE, resolution = "20m")
florida <- us_states[us_states$NAME == "Florida", ]
florida_20m <- us_states_20m[us_states_20m$NAME == "Florida", ]
plot(florida)
plot(florida_20m, border = "red", add = TRUE)
```
